text: I wish I had a simply way of seeing immediately when I needed to do an update :slightly_smiling_face:. I have something that shows on my bash prompt the state of the git repo I’m currently in, so that I don’t have to check to see if I need to pull.

text: If you are tracking last commit on julia master and using packages that have to use a lot of the internals, then you probably need to update frequently or even track master of those packages.

elements.text: If you are tracking last commit on julia master and using packages that have to use a lot of the internals, then you probably need to update frequently or even track master of those packages.

text: Although that tends to land me in hot water more often than just updating Julia, since people do try to keep up with the nightlies at least.
